titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Mexican Movie Stills and Lobby Cards, 1937-1977 M1080
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Processed by Special Collections staff.

publicationstmt.publisher: Dept. of Special Collections & University Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2014-04-17T14:14-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English.

did.unittitle: Mexican Movie Stills and Lobby Cards

repository.corpname: Dept. of Special Collections & University Archives

did.abstract: 2,226 photographs from 280 movies, each title has 8 original lobby cards, unless noted by asterik.

scopecontent.head: Collection Scope and Content Summary
scopecontent.p: There are two series: Series I consists of material arranged alphabetically by title, from 1937 to 1963. Series II consists of material arranged alphabetically by title, from 1963 to 1977.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Mexican Movie Stills and Lobby Cards. M1080. Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

accessrestrict.head: Access to Collection
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research use. Audio-visual materials are not available in original format, and must be reformatted to a digital use copy.
